claw.tatsu.analysis.dependency

Class DependenceAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.analysis.dependency.DependenceAnalysis

  • public class DependenceAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hold methods to help analysis of loop dependencies on XcodeML/F intermediate representation.
    Author:
    clementval

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DependenceAnalysis(Xnode loop)
      Constructs and run the analysis of dependencies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DependenceAnalysis

        public DependenceAnalysis(Xnode loop)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs and run the analysis of dependencies.
        Parameters:
        loop - The do statement node to be analyzed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the given node is null or is not a do statement node.

    • Method Detail

      • getInductionVariable

        public java.lang.String getInductionVariable()
        Get the induction variable string value of the iteration space.
        Returns:
        String value representing the induction variable.

      • getDistanceVector

        public int getDistanceVector()
        Get the distance vector. Represents the "shape" of the dependence.
        Returns:
        Integer value representing the distance vector.

      • getDirectionVector

        public DependenceDirection getDirectionVector()
        Get the direction vector. Represents the direction in which the dependence is defined.
        Returns:
        Enumeration value representing the direction (none, backward, forward)

      • isIndependent

        public boolean isIndependent()
        Check whether the iteration space has dependencies or not.
        Returns:
        True if the iteration space is independent. False otherwise.

      • getDoStmt

        public Xnode getDoStmt()
        Get the do statement node used for this analysis.
        Returns:
        The node.

      • getInfoMsg

        public java.lang.String getInfoMsg()
        Get a formatted message that holds various information.
        Returns:
        Message containing the line number of the do statement, the information about the dependence and the induction variable.
